features: POWERS 4 DEVICES AT ONCE: This compact and lightweight 10A European Type E / F grounded travel adapter charges and powers up to 4 devices simultaneously. via USB-C, USB and AC Outlet. It works with most electrical outlets in over 90 countries, mainly throughout Europe, but also includes other commonly visited countries such as South Korea, Vietnam and Thailand.

20W PD QUICK CHARGE: Comes with a powerful 10A UK outlet & 3 fast charge USB ports (2 x USB-C, 1 x USB), which will charge your devices up to 70% faster than a standard charger. Supports broad input range (100-250V) for international voltage requirements. Note: MyTravelPal does not convert voltage.

A SAFE TRAVEL ADAPTER: SUITABLE FOR HIGH POWERED DEVICES: One of the very few travel adapters that passes the very strict regulatory standard BS:8546. This MyTravelPal adapter has surge protection and a ground / earth connection; essential safety features for many electrical appliances, meaning you can use this adapter with high powered electricals such as computers, curling tongs, hair dryers, laptops, phones, etc without worry!

BUILT TO LAST – Unlike others available on the market, our adaptors are made with high quality, durable materials that don’t overheat, provide good insultation, and are flame retardant. Travel with peace of mind!
description: Product Description MyTravelPal European Travel Adapter (Type E/F) KEY FEATURES UK to Europe Travel Adapter (Type E / F) This European travel adapter can be used to safely power your devices when used with sockets Type E and F , which are most commonly found throughout most of Europe (NOT Denmark, Italy, Switzerland). Please see below for the full list. Note: this is not a voltage converter. Never Run Out Of Charge! With 3 USB Ports (2 x USB-C, 1 x USB-A) and a 10A AC outlet, you can charge up to 4 devices with this European adapter! MyTravelPal's USB ports are compatible with phones, tablets, watches etc and charge devices 70% faster than a standard adapter via 'smart charging' (20W PD). Protects You & Your Devices From Harm Unlike other most adapters available on the market, this MyTravelPal European adapter passes all British Safety standards and has surge protection & child shutters: safety features that protect you, your children, and all of your devices from harm. Use MyTravelPal adaptors with peace of mind! Suitable For All Types Of Devices The MyTravelPal Europe Plug Adapter is earthed, meaning it's safe to use with high powered devices such as hair dryers, curling irons, and laptops etc, as well as phones, tablets, watches and more. This European Adapter is a one stop solution for charging & powering devices whilst you're away. What Countries Is This Adapter Compatible In? Most of Europe and in any country that offers a Type E / F socket - please see the description above for detail. Countries in Europe that may not offer Type E / F are Denmark, Italy & Switzerland as these countries have their own unique plug types. What Makes This MyTravelPal European Travel Adapter Different To Others? Unlike other adapters available on the market, all MyTravelPal adapters pass strict British Safety standards and include surge protection & child shutters - essential safety features that protect you, your children, and all of your devices from harm. How Do I Insert My Plug Into This European Adapter? MyTravelPal comes with blue child safety shutters, which stop foreign objects being inserted into the adapter. To bypass these, when putting a plug into the adapter, angle the plug so that the ground pin goes in first. See instructions for detail. Is This A Voltage Converter? No, this is a travel adapter. If your appliance is from the US or another country that operates on a different voltage, you will also need a voltage converter. Where Is MyTravelPal From? We are a small famiy owned business, based in London - UK. Thank you for your support! Based in London, UK Learn About MyTravelPal Hey, I'm Steph - the creator of MyTravelPal; a small UK company that sells award winning travel adapters. I created MyTravelPal because I could never find a suitable range of adapters that were small and powerful, but above all, safe and durable. I really hope you love MyTravelPal as much as I do! MyTravelPal was featured in EasyJet Traveller "Travel Essentials" in 2023, T3 Gadget Magazine "Top Travel Adapter 2025" , Daily Mail "Best Adapter 2025", and Tech Advisor' "Best Travel Adapter" 2025.
